name: Blue Wizard of the Desert
description:
You are one of the blue wizards and so you must drive in the desert at such great speed, but don't worry because you have air conditioning and also there are many things that you can look at, but not speak to, including the mother of the PROTO DOGS :)

lick the mouse clicker to aim your eyes, and slash wsad to speed about quickly at speed.

This game is proudly brought to you by itch.io and the Australian Government.
